Uses of Package
it.polimi.se2018.controller

  • Packages that use it.polimi.se2018.controller 
    Package Description
    it.polimi.se2018.controller  
    it.polimi.se2018.model  
    it.polimi.se2018.view  
  • Classes in it.polimi.se2018.controller used by it.polimi.se2018.controller 
    Class and Description
    Controller
    Class that represent the Controller according the MVC paradigm.
    ControllerState
    Abstract class that represents a generic state of the Controller.
    ControllerStateManager
    Manages the creation of Controller's States
    DiceBag
    Contains all the dices that can be drafted and used.
    DraftControllerState
    This is the state during which the current player can draft a dice from draftpool.
    EndControllerState
    This is the state during which the current player can only end the turn.
    EndToolCardEffectControllerState
    This is an implicit state that ends automatically the effect of the current used toolcard.
    ObjectiveCardFactory
    Creates all the types of Objective Cards: PublicObjectiveCard and PrivateObjectiveCard.
    PlaceControllerState
    This is the state in which the current player can place a dice on the own windowPattern.
    RankingRecord
    Class that represents the ranking record for a single played, including the cumulative points made, the number of lost and won games and the total time played.
    Scorer
    Singleton class that calculates and retrieves the rankings of a given list of players and public objective cards.
    StartControllerState
    This is the initial state of each turn during which current player can draft a dice or use a toolcard.
    ToolCardControllerState
    This is the state in which current player can use a toolcard.
  • Classes in it.polimi.se2018.controller used by it.polimi.se2018.model 
    Class and Description
    ControllerState
    Abstract class that represents a generic state of the Controller.
    NoMoreRoundsAvailableException
    The class NoMoreRoundsAvailableException is a form of Exception that is used to notify the application that no more rounds are available.
    NoMoreTurnsAvailableException
    The class NoMoreTurnsAvailableException is a form of Exception that is used to notify the application that no more turns are available.
  • Classes in it.polimi.se2018.controller used by it.polimi.se2018.view 
    Class and Description
    RankingRecord
    Class that represents the ranking record for a single played, including the cumulative points made, the number of lost and won games and the total time played.
